lines.text: I imagine nothing, I suspect everything. An Empress with no enemies is no Empress.
[describing a diorama he made as a gift for his fiancee]
This man is a deserter, and this man is a general. He's going to order this sergeant to give the man 100 lashes! I expect he'll die!
[Grand Duke Peter III is ill]
Say that prayers are being offered in every church in Prussia.
With respect, Sire, I don't see that would do much good.
If nothing else, it will show her how fast our sources of information are. You're doing good work, Ernst.
Thank you, sire. I will leave within the hour.
Don't drink too much vodka there.
I'll try.
[Catherine's betrothed, the Grand Duke, is ill]
Did you know, after two months, hardly anyone has spoken to me. It's as if I didn't exist!

Well, my dear, you hardly do. You are, I hesitate to say it, on the very brink of extinction. If the Grand Duke should die, you become the tiniest footnote to history. Everyone at Court knows that. But if he lives, however, you would certainly find yourself surrounded by thousands of new friends again, fawning all over you like puppies.
And you?
Ah, well. I am a foreigner, and an old man. I can afford the luxury of true friendship.
[After operating on a drunk Grand Duke Peter to correct his sexual dysfunction]
What do we tell him?

Tell him? I'd be astonished if he mentions it at all. Would you? Don't you young officers have some game where you measure your "weapon" on the table? If he asks, tell him that he cut it on a piece of broken glass. Then I suggest you tell him that he won the contest.
I said no mourning!
I am told that black becomes me. AND I mourn. I mourn for a woman who once loved Russia, and I mourn for the Russia she loved.
To the royal family!
Pray, tell the Grand Duke Peter, that the royal family consists of he, myself, and the Grand Duke Paul, our son. That is all.
You are an ignoramus.
Every court has its clown, don't you think?
This frail, young slip of a girl has won herself an empire, and there is nothing anyone can do about it. Against all the odds, that is what she has done.
